translation: When a person sees all beings as resting in the One and emanating from the One alone, they then become Brahman.
commentary: 13.31 When when? Bhutapruthagbhavam the whole variety of beings? Ekastham resting in the One? Doesn't he see sees? Then from that? Eve alone? f and? expansion the spreading? Brahma Brahman? sampadyate (he) becomes? Then then.Commentary A man attains to unity with the Supreme when he knows or realizes through intuition that all these manifold forms are rooted in the One.
